item.title: About
item.description: Sources, References and Examples Sources are specified: [src] - Sources: Link to where a information or thought is coming from. [ref] - References: Link to a supporting or further informations. [eg] - Example: Link to an example of a information. This website contains links to external sites that are not operated by me. I am not responsible for content, privacy policies and/or practices of any third-party websites. Visiting external links is at your own discretion and risk.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Introduction I (“n41l.it”, “me”) value your privacy. This policy explains what data n41l.it collects, how I use it, and your rights. Hoster For hosting of the website I am using the following provider: GitHub Inc. 88 Colin P Kelly Jr St. San Francisco, CA 94107 United States This is the recipient of your personal data. This corresponds to my legitimate interest in not having to maintain a server on my premises.
